column4: on macs with efi booting:  These can't run ubuntu, without hax, right?
You'll need the EFI version of Grub... But I think that's about it
Simply install the grub-efi package and you should be good to go (I think. Might need to re-run grub-install -- I'm not sure about how well Ubuntu automates this.)
Mac people are Mac people. You can't get them to use *anything*
